title: Brief Introduction of QMC
content: Tookits for Quantum Espresso related calculations #

title: Examples
content: examples of QMC calculations #  graphene #  diamond #  silcion #

title: Install
content: Install QMC #   Simple required: Quantum espresso, EPW, wannier90, python3 #   install Quantum espresso  insure you have required compliers for Quanutm espresso ./configure make pw pp ph install wannier90  make w90 install EPW  make epw install python3 (need numpy, matplotlib)  install Anaconda3 or miniconda3 pip install numpy matplotlib  Advanced required: thirdorder.py, fourthorder.py, ShengBTE, Perturbo #   install thirdorder.py install fourthorder.py install ShengBTE install Perturo
